properties.displayName: Remote Access Tool - Team Viewer Session Started On Windows Host
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine endswith "TeamViewer_Desktop.exe --IPCport 5939 --Module 1" and FolderPath =~ "TeamViewer_Desktop.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath =~ "TeamViewer_Service.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects the command line executed when TeamViewer starts a session started by a remote host.
Once a connection has been started, an investigator can verify the connection details by viewing the "incoming_connections.txt" log file in the Tea
